title: Pulsefire Twisted Fate Animations
body:
Does anyone else have a really hard time playing with/against someone with the Pulsefire TF skin?  The ult is nearly invisible to me, and the cards are really difficult to see as well.  

I hope a change for this skin is at least considered, because while the animations are cool, it makes it very difficult to see and is kind of an unfair advantage for players with that skin.
